short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for TheModern.Press Web Platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TheModern.Press (TM.P) is a knowledge-benchmarking platform that provides an intelligent networking ecosystem for know-how development in sophisticated industries such as the financial markets, venture capital, management, environment, academy, health and law.

TM.P presents users with web-based tools that aim to maximize mutual utility process between content-providers and users: the platform, while highlighting most competitive parts of a providerâ€™s content product in structure, multiplies user benefit ratio in terms of filtering-out noise and accessing substance. 

The TM.P Workstation is designed to make user feedback-interaction-experience a plain, simple, seamless, functional and game-oriented one.
